name: The House Always Wins (Timmah514)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move, Left Click to throw die, Space / Right Click to dash

How to play:

The slot machines at your casino are broken and people are earning too much! But the rest of the casino is making money so you just have to scare customers away from the slots, wanna know how? Pelt them with a comically large die of course! Remember tp pick up the die after throwing.
